Source file src/github.com/redhat-developer/odo/pkg/odo/cli/env/view.go

Documentation: github.com/redhat-developer/odo/pkg/odo/cli/env 

     1  package env
     2  
     3  import (
     4  	"fmt"
     5  	"os"
     6  
     7  	"github.com/pkg/errors"
     8  	"github.com/redhat-developer/odo/pkg/envinfo"
     9  	"github.com/redhat-developer/odo/pkg/log"
    10  	"github.com/redhat-developer/odo/pkg/machineoutput"
    11  	"github.com/redhat-developer/odo/pkg/odo/cmdline"
    12  	"github.com/redhat-developer/odo/pkg/odo/genericclioptions"
    13  	"github.com/spf13/cobra"
    14  	ktemplates "k8s.io/kubectl/pkg/util/templates"
    15  )
    16  
    17  const viewCommandName = "view"
    18  
    19  var (
    20  	viewLongDesc = ktemplates.LongDesc(`
    21  	View current values in odo environment file
    22  	`)
    23  
    24  	viewExample = ktemplates.Examples(`
    25  	# For viewing the current environment configuration settings
    26  	%[1]s
    27  	`)
    28  )
    29  
    30  // ViewOptions encapsulates the options for the command
    31  type ViewOptions struct {
    32  	// Env context
    33  	cfg *envinfo.EnvSpecificInfo
    34  
    35  	// Flags
    36  	contextFlag string
    37  }
    38  
    39  // NewViewOptions creates a new ViewOptions instance
    40  func NewViewOptions() *ViewOptions {
    41  	return &ViewOptions{}
    42  }
    43  
    44  // Complete completes ViewOptions after they've been created
    45  func (o *ViewOptions) Complete(cmdline cmdline.Cmdline, args []string) (err error) {
    46  	o.cfg, err = envinfo.NewEnvSpecificInfo(o.contextFlag)
    47  	if err != nil {
    48  		return errors.Wrap(err, "failed to load environment file")
    49  	}
    50  
    51  	return nil
    52  }
    53  
    54  // Validate validates the ViewOptions based on completed values
    55  func (o *ViewOptions) Validate() (err error) {
    56  	if !o.cfg.Exists() {
    57  		return errors.Errorf("the context directory doesn't contain a component, please refer `odo create --help` on how to create a component")
    58  	}
    59  
    60  	return nil
    61  }
    62  
    63  // Run contains the logic for the command
    64  func (o *ViewOptions) Run() (err error) {
    65  	info := envinfo.NewInfo(o.cfg.GetComponentSettings())
    66  	if log.IsJSON() {
    67  		machineoutput.OutputSuccess(info)
    68  		return
    69  	}
    70  	info.Output(os.Stdout)
    71  	return nil
    72  }
    73  
    74  // NewCmdView implements the env view odo command
    75  func NewCmdView(name, fullName string) *cobra.Command {
    76  	o := NewViewOptions()
    77  	envViewCmd := &cobra.Command{
    78  		Use:         name,
    79  		Short:       "View current values in odo environment file",
    80  		Long:        viewLongDesc,
    81  		Example:     fmt.Sprintf(fmt.Sprint(viewExample), fullName),
    82  		Annotations: map[string]string{"machineoutput": "json"},
    83  
    84  		Args: cobra.ExactArgs(0),
    85  		Run: func(cmd *cobra.Command, args []string) {
    86  			genericclioptions.GenericRun(o, cmd, args)
    87  		},
    88  	}
    89  
    90  	envViewCmd.Flags().StringVar(&o.contextFlag, "context", "", "Use given context directory as a source for component settings")
    91  
    92  	return envViewCmd
    93  }
